title: 2024 Festive accessibility quiz
authors: Kelly Clarkson, Senior Accessibility Specialist, Government Digital Services
Samantha Merrett, Senior Accessibility Specialist, Ministry of Justice

content.text: We hope you enjoy this light-hearted, festive quiz brought to you by Kelly and Samatha and their furry friends who appear in the images. A big thanks to fellow accessibility colleagues who contributed questions!
A quiz is a fantastic way to bring work colleagues together, spread holiday cheer and test your festive and accessibility knowledge. Why not test yourself and then share with others for a bit of fun!
Answers can be found at the end of the quiz.
And finally, festivities wouldn’t be complete without a ‘cracker-style’ question
